ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Simple.  When you get low on health you mez the mob and heal up.  Once you are back at full health you resume beating down the mob.  Used this to kill the
ygData.messageBody:
Simple. When you get low on health you mez the mob and heal up. Once you
are back at full health you resume beating down the mob. Used this to kill
the Rotting Skele just recently. Also back before Pixie Strike was nerfed I
used this to solo mistmoore :)

Rokenn

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 12:14 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message


Hmm, I'm not feeling too smart. How does a mez help us solo? Doesn't
having to use this song as one of
the songs in your twist slow down what is already a painfully slow process
to begin with? And I'm not
sure I'd want to try to solo a summoning MOB in any case...

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk



"Reeves, Patrick W" wrote:

> Post 40th bards slowly start losing power till 53 with Song of Twilight.
With SoT you can solo anything
> in the game that this song will stick on.
